description:
This simple yet very effective Pullover Polar Fleece is a staple in any outdoor enthusiast's wardrobe. Its relatively thin thickness makes it perfect for layering under a shell during chilly fall days or simply enjoying it as a cozy comfort garment during cool mornings at the cottage.

Featuring a convenient kangaroo handwarmer pocket at the front, this pullover, made from 100 % recycled polyester fleece, will quickly become a go-to piece to go adventuring that you'll find yourself reaching for more often than you ever imagined!
name: Hooke Pullover Polar Fleece - Mens
